ParseFrom<T>(T, string[])

Parses command-line arguments into the provided options instance.

Declaration
public static (T, bool) ParseFrom<T>(T options, string[] args) where T : IMewdekoCommandOptions
Parameters
Type Name Description
T options

The instance of options to populate.
string[] args

The command-line arguments to parse.
Returns
Type Description
(T, bool)

A tuple containing the populated options instance and a boolean indicating whether the parsing was successful.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of options to parse.
